summary: This document contains the Articles of Incorporation for a corporation named MORT, INC., established in the U.S. Virgin Islands. It outlines the corporation's purposes, powers, and the names of the incorporators, including William S. McConnell, Denise J. Richards, and Michelle Connor.

persons.name: William S. McConnell
persons.context: William S. McConnell is one of the incorporators of MORT, INC., as stated in the Articles of Incorporation.

persons.name: Denise J. Richards
persons.context: Denise J. Richards is listed as an incorporator of MORT, INC.

persons.name: Michelle Connor
persons.context: Michelle Connor is mentioned as one of the incorporators of MORT, INC.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter, B-3, St. Thomas, U.S. Virgin Islands 00802

keyFacts: The corporation MORT, INC. was established for various lawful business activities.
The principal office of MORT, INC. is located in St. Thomas, U.S. Virgin Islands.
The corporation is authorized to issue 1,000 shares of common stock with a par value of $0.01.
